* Programmers - Miller (I can't help but associate this name with technology and programming. It's a very modern-sounding name, if you will.)
* Data analysts - Rodriguez (This name has a bit of a technical feel to it, don't you think? It sounds quite analytical and precise.)
* Secretaries - Miller (I can't help but associate this name with administrative work. It's a very practical-sounding name, if you will.)
